column4: VMware to acquire startup CloudHealth in push to grow cloud offerings
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Aug 27 VMware Inc will acquire CloudHealth Technologies as part of the information technology company's continued push into cloud-based software services  the company announced on Monday.

column4: Tesla  Elon Musk win dismissal of lawsuit over Model 3 production
column5: A federal judge in San Francisco dismissed a securities fraud lawsuit in which Tesla Inc  shareholders accused the electric car company and Chief Executive Elon Musk of misleading them about the progress of production of its Model 3 vehicle.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla  Elon Musk win dismissal of lawsuit over Model 3 production
column5: Aug 27 A federal judge in San Francisco dismissed a securities fraud lawsuit in which Tesla Inc shareholders accused the electric car company and Chief Executive Elon Musk of misleading them about the progress of production of its Model 3 vehicle.

column4: Tesla wins dismissal of shareholder lawsuit over Model 3 production
column5: Aug 27 A federal judge in San Francisco has dismissed a lawsuit in which Tesla Inc shareholders accused the carmaker of misleading the public about the progress on production of its Model 3 vehicle.

column4: Tesla shares dip 3 percent after Musk abandons buyout
column5: Shares in Tesla Inc  fell just under 3 percent on Monday after Chief Executive Elon Musk abandoned his plan to take the electric carmaker private  with analysts saying the company needed new blood among senior management to prop up its standing with investors. | Video

column4: Musk's U-turn on Tesla deal could intensify his legal  regulatory woes
column5: WASHINGTON Tesla Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk's decision to abruptly abandon a plan to take his electric carmaker private will not resolve his mounting regulatory and legal woes  and may even make them worse  some securities lawyers said.

column4: UPDATE 4-Tesla shares dip 3 pct after Musk abandons buyout
column5: * Analysts say Tesla could do with new CEO or operations chief

column4: RPT-Musk's U-turn on Tesla deal could intensify his legal  regulatory woes

column4: Tesla's German shares fall after CEO Musk drops plan to take company private
column5: LONDON Germany-listed shares in Tesla  fell more than 3 percent in early deals on the Tradegate exchange on Monday  after Chief Executive Elon Musk called off his bid to take the company private.
